name: Article Summarizer
description: Summarizes articles into a structured format with key points, takeaways, and a one-sentence summary.
author: prompt-crafting-team

inputs.name: article
inputs.description: The full article text to summarize.

inputs.name: max_points
inputs.description: Maximum number of key points to extract.

messages.content: You are a precise summarization assistant. Extract the most important information from articles and present it in a structured format. Be factual and avoid adding opinions or information not present in the source material.

Summarize the following article. Extract up to {{max_points}} key points.

---
{{article}}
---

Return your summary as JSON with fields: one_sentence_summary, key_points (array of strings), and takeaway.

examples.name: Short tech article

inputs.article: TypeScript 5.8 introduces several new features including isolated declarations, which allow declaration files to be generated without type-checking the entire project. This significantly speeds up build times for large monorepos. The release also includes improvements to control flow analysis and new configuration options for project references.

examples.expected_output: {"one_sentence_summary": "TypeScript 5.8 introduces isolated declarations and other features that improve build performance for large projects.", "key_points": ["Isolated declarations allow faster declaration file generation", "Build times improve significantly for large monorepos", "Control flow analysis and project reference configuration improved"], "takeaway": "Teams with large TypeScript monorepos should consider upgrading to benefit from faster builds."}

output_format.description: A JSON object with one_sentence_summary, key_points array, and takeaway.

constraints: Only include information present in the source article
Do not add personal opinions or bias
